org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.spi

Interface DatastoreProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EhcacheDatastoreProvider, InfinispanDatastoreProvider, MapDatastoreProvider

    public interface DatastoreProvider
extends Service
    Provides datastore centric configurations and native access.

    Implementations of this service offer native interfaces to access the underlying datastore. It is also responsible for starting and stopping the connection to the datastore.

    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard , Gunnar Morling

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GlobalContext<?,?> getConfigurationBuilder(ConfigurationContext context)
      Returns a new store-specific GlobalContext instance.
      Class<? extends GridDialect> getDefaultDialect() 
      Class<? extends QueryParserService> getDefaultQueryParserServiceType()
      Returns the type of QueryParserService to be used for executing queries against the underlying datastore if no parser service type was explicitly configured by the user via the OgmConfiguration.OGM_QUERY_PARSER_SERVICE option.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultDialect

        Class<? extends GridDialect> getDefaultDialect()

      • getDefaultQueryParserServiceType

        Class<? extends QueryParserService> getDefaultQueryParserServiceType()
        Returns the type of QueryParserService to be used for executing queries against the underlying datastore if no parser service type was explicitly configured by the user via the OgmConfiguration.OGM_QUERY_PARSER_SERVICE option.
        Returns:
        the default QueryParserService for the underlying datastore; never null

      • getConfigurationBuilder

        GlobalContext<?,?> getConfigurationBuilder(ConfigurationContext context)
        Returns a new store-specific GlobalContext instance.
        Parameters:
        context - configuration context to be used as factory for creating the global context object
        Returns:
        a new GlobalContext
